definition: to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on
to act shamelessly/to behave in a way that leaves others tut-tutting and shaking their heads in disapproval

sentences.english: He's a deadbeat and a hypocrite.
You might as well throw your money into the sea as lend it to that rascal.
sentences.chinese: 你借钱给那个无赖，不啻把钱丢在海里。

sentences.english: The coward conquest of a wretch's knife.
sentences.chinese: 无赖的刀下一个怯懦的俘获。

sentences.english: He's more of a fool than a knave.
sentences.chinese: 与其说他是无赖，不如说他是傻瓜。

sentences.english: One day two rascals appeared at the court.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，两个无赖出现在宫廷之上。

sentences.english: The shameless loafer has no facial of hypocritical male.
sentences.chinese: 无耻无赖无脸的伪善男。

sentences.english: I know it is a bummer .
Do not waste your pity on a scamp.
sentences.chinese: 不要在无赖身上浪费同情心。

sentences.english: Here is our poor street all riddled with balls. They are a pack of rascals.
sentences.chinese: 我们倒霉的街道被乱弹射击，这是一群无赖。

sentences.english: That sounded like a pretty bum deal for a world-changing new communication platform.
sentences.chinese: 这对一个改变世界的交流平台来说有点太无赖了吧。

sentences.english: I will not pardon you, you rascal.
sentences.chinese: 我不会宽恕你，你这个无赖。

sentences.english: Knaves and nettles are akin; stroak, em kindly, yet they, ll sting.
sentences.chinese: 无赖和荨麻，你轻摸也要被扎。

sentences.english: I mean, there was such hooliganism and vandalism.
sentences.chinese: 我的意思是，有这样的无赖行径和破坏行为。

sentences.english: Sarcasm is the refuge of scoundrels.
I've seen Fara defend herself against a few drunken ruffians .
sentences.chinese: 我曾经看过法拉在抵抗一些酒醒的无赖。

definition: to act shamelessly/to behave in a way that leaves others tut-tutting and shaking their heads in disapproval
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
to have no sense of shame/shameless
to act shamelessly/to refuse to acknowledge that one has lost the game, or made a promise etc/to act dumb/to act as if sth never happened
